summary: This module provides common utilities for D-Bus communication in AppArmor, including functions for logging D-Bus messages and manipulating D-Bus message contents. It serves as a helper library for the AppArmor regression tests related to D-Bus functionality.

logs.reason: Logs D-Bus messages with a prefix to the specified file descriptor. Used for debugging and tracing D-Bus communication in AppArmor tests.
logs.resolution: This is an informational log used for debugging. If unexpected messages appear, check the D-Bus configuration and message handling in the application.

logs.reason: Converts D-Bus message types to human-readable strings, likely for inclusion in logs.
logs.resolution: This is a utility function for log formatting. No direct resolution required.
